schema.description: Send operations to idchain to be applied to BrightID nodes' databases after consensus

id1.description: brightid of the user making the directed connection

id2.description: brightid of the target of the directed connection

sig1.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id1

reportReason.description: for reported level, the reason for reporting the user specificed by id2

replacedWith.description: for reported as replaced, the new brightid of the replaced account

requestProof.description: brightid + "|" + timestamp signed by the reported user to prove that he requested the connection

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id1.description: brightid of the first user making the connection

id2.description: brightid of the second user making the connection

sig1.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id1

sig2.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id2

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id1.description: brightid of the user removing the connection

id2.description: brightid of the second user that the connection with is being removed

reason.description: the reason for removing connection specificed by the user represented by id1

sig1.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id1

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

group.description: the unique id of the group

inviteData2.description: the group AES key encrypted for signingKey of the user represented by id2

inviteData3.description: the group AES key encrypted for signingKey of the user represented by id3

url.description: the url that group data (profile image and name) encrypted by group AES key can be fetched from

sig1.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the creator of group represented by id1

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the group admin who want to remove the group

group.description: the unique id of the group

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id1

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the user wants to join the group

group.description: the unique id of the group that the user represented by id wants to join

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the user wants to leave the group

group.description: the unique id of the group that the user represented by id wants to leave

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the user who is setting his/her trusted connections

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the user who is trying to recover his/her account by setting new signing key on his/her brightid

signingKey.description: the public key of the new key pair that user will use to sign operations with

id1.description: brightid of a trusted connection of the user represented by id

id2.description: brightid of another trusted connection of the user represented by id

sig1.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the trusted connection represented by id1

sig2.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the trusted connection represented by id2

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the user who is linking his/her brightid to a context id

contextId.description: the unique id of the user represented by brightid in the specific context

encrypted.description: the json representation of `{id: id, contextId: contextId}` encrypted using an AES key shared between all nodes manage linking brightids to contextIds for a specific context. This field is not sent by clients and will be replaced by `id` and `contextId` fields before sending operation to blockchain to keep the relation of brightids to contextIds private.

context.description: the context name in which the user represented by brightid is linking context id with his/her brightid

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

contextId.description: the contextId for the user that is being sponsored by context

id.description: brightid of the user that is being sponsored by context. This field is not provided by context owners who sponsor the user as they do not have users brightids. BrightID nodes that are trusted by context owners and have the private key that is used to spend sponsorships assigned to the context, will replace `contextId` by this field before sending this operation to blockchain

app.description: the app name that user is being sponsored by

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the private key shared between context owners and trusted node operators which enable them to spend sponsorships assigned to the context

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

inviter.description: brightid of the user who has admin rights in the group and can invite others to the group

invitee.description: brightid of the user whom is invited to the group

group.description: the unique id of the group that invitee is being invited to

data.description: the group AES key encrypted for signingKey of the invitee

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the inviter

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

dismisser.description: brightid of the user who has admin rights in the group and can dismiss others from the group

dismissee.description: brightid of the user whom is dismissed from the group

group.description: the unique id of the group that dismissee is being dismissed from

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the dismisser

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

id.description: brightid of the user who has admin rights in the group and can grant administratorship to other members

admin.description: brightid of the member whom is being granted administratorship of the group

group.description: the unique id of the group that new admin is being added to

sig.description: deterministic json representation of operation object signed by the user represented by id

timestamp.description: milliseconds since epoch when the operation created

requestBody.description: Send operations to idchain to be applied to BrightID nodes' databases after consensus

post.description: Add an operation be applied after consensus.
post.summary: Add an operation to be applied after consensus

hash.description: sha256 hash of the operation message used for generating signature

parameters.description: sha256 hash of the operation message
parameters.name: hash

get.summary: Get state and result of an operation

result.description: result of operation after being applied. If operation is failed this field contain the reason.

parameters.description: the brightid of the user
parameters.name: id

get.description: Gets a user's score, verifications, joining date, lists of connections, groups and eligible groups.

type.description: type of group which is "primary" or "general"

isNew.description: true if some of founders did not join the group yet and group is still in founding stage

url.description: url of encrypted group data (name and photo)

type.description: type of group which is "primary" or "general"

isNew.description: true if some of founders did not join the group yet and group is still in founding stage

url.description: url of encrypted group data (name and photo)

invited.description: timestamp when the user was invited

data.description: encrypted version of the AES key that group name and photo uploaded to `url` encrypted withinvitee should first decrypt this data with his/her signingKey and then fetch data in `url` and decrypt that using the AES key

level.description: the confidence level set on this user

hasPrimaryGroup.description: true if user has primary group

trusted.description: list of trusted connections of the user

flaggers.description: an object containing ids of flaggers as key and reason as value
an object containing ids of flaggers as key and reason as value

parameters.description: the brightid of the user
parameters.name: id

get.description: Gets list of user's verification objects with their properties

parameters.description: the brightid of the user that info requested about
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: the brightid of the user that requested info
parameters.name: requestor

get.summary: Get profile information of a user

connectionsNum.description: number of connections with already known or recovery level

createdAt.description: creation time of user specified by id

reports.description: list of reports for the user specified by id

verifications.description: list of verification objects user has with properties each verification has

parameters.description: the brightid of the user
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: the direction of the connection
parameters.name: direction

get.description: Gets list of user's connections with levels and timestamps
get.summary: Get inbound or outbound connections of a user

parameters.description: the app that user is verified for
parameters.name: app

parameters.description: the contextId of user within the context
parameters.name: contextId

parameters.description: the value will be eth or nacl to indicate the type of signature returned
parameters.name: signed

parameters.description: request a timestamp of the specified format to be added to the response. Accepted values: "seconds", "milliseconds"
parameters.name: timestamp

get.description: Gets a signed verification for the user that is signed by the node

unique.description: true if user is verified for an app

contextIds.description: list of all contextIds this user linked from most recent to oldest including current active contextId as first member

timestamp.description: timestamp of the verification if a timestamp was requested by including a 'timestamp' parameter

sig.description: verification message signed by the node

404.description: context, contextId or verification not found

parameters.description: the app for which the user is verified
parameters.name: app

get.description: Gets list of all of contextIds in the context that are currently linked to unique humans
get.summary: Gets list of all of contextIds

parameters.description: Unique name of the app
parameters.name: app

verification.description: verification required for using the app

verificationUrl.description: the url to PUT a verification with /:id

url.description: the base url for the app

verification.description: verification required for using the app

verificationUrl.description: the url to PUT a verification with /:id

url.description: the base url for the app

lastProcessedBlock.description: last block that consensus receiver service processed

verificationsBlock.description: the block that scorer service updated verifications based on operations got applied before that block

parameters.description: The key of app
parameters.name: app

parameters.description: The action name
parameters.name: action

parameters.description: the contextId of user within the context
parameters.name: contextId

parameters.description: the secret key for testing the app
parameters.name: testingKey

put.description: Updating state of contextId to be considered as unsponsored, unlinked or unverified temporarily for testing.

parameters.description: Unique name of the app
parameters.name: app

parameters.description: The action name
parameters.name: action

parameters.description: the contextId of user within the context
parameters.name: contextId

parameters.description: the testing private key of the app
parameters.name: testingKey

delete.description: Remove limitations applied to a contextId to be considered as unsponsored, unlinked or unverified temporarily for testing.
delete.summary: Remove blocking state applied on user's verification for testing.

info.title: brightid
info.description: Allows BrightID clients (typically mobile) to update the social graph.
